text:
Kishori Ballal (1937/1938 – 18 February 2020) was an Indian actress. She was known for her works in Kannada cinema. Ballal was born in Karnataka, India. Her best known works were "Gair Kaanooni", "Ek Alag Mausam" and in "Aakramana".
Ballal died at a hospital in Bengaluru, India on 18 February 2020 at the age of 82.
